title: ‎Unnai Maatrinaal‬ Lyrics Ko 2 Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Ko 2  ‎Unnai Maatrinaal‬ Song Lyrics 
Singers: Harish Sivaramakrishnan
Music: Leon James
Lyrics: Na. Muthukumar

 Veredhuvum nee dhaan seiya vendaam
Un kadamai seithaal adhuve podhum
Vazhiyil valaivadhinaal
nadhigal kalangiduma
Adhu kadal thedum
Alaigal udaivadhinal
kadalum varundhiduma.

Dhinam poraadum
Unnai maatrinaal
Unnai Unnai unnai maatrinaal
Oorai maatralaam
Oorai ulagai neeyum maatralaam
Netrai maatrinaal
Indrai maatralaam
Varum naalai neeyum maatralaam

Veredhuvum nee dhaan seiya vendaam
Un kadamai seithaal adhuve podhum

Thani manidhan inge
Edhai seiya vendum
Than kudumbam adhai
kaaka vendum vendum.

Thalaivarellam inge

Than desam adhai
kaaka vendum vendum.

Ettu dhikkum etti paar
